data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Nii é loozu é zoloo guye wooi ma, nii daa ga: «Bulɛgi ma ʋuaiti». Zeele wooi. Azafe ná-guyei.
Baala kpulugi Izilayɛle makɛ nui, woilo gòoi ma,
Efelayime wolodamaiti tuɠɔ, ta Ɓɛnzamɛn, ta Manasé.
Ee, GALA, gi zei ʋele ɓɛtɛ ʋolu,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii!
Ɗa ti-ɠɔnɔgi ɠɛɛzu ga ziizoolɛi,
Ɗa gi ɠɛɛzu ga sakpe ganii gi-zeiɲɔɠɔiti bɛ,
Ee, GALA, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii, gi zei ʋele ɓɛtɛ ʋolu,
È leezɛn ansaɠɔgi lɔɔɠulani Ezipete yooi zu,
È zooi ɠaaɓɛtɛni tuɠɔ.
Ná-niinigi ʋɛɛni gizeiti ma,
Ma ɓekegiti ti zeelini eyɛsu kpoloɗɛi ma,
Leeni vaa zu è zeɠei wɔai ná-sasaiti ba,
Boigi ɠa ɠulazu dɔɓɔi zu, é ʋa é ɗa koloɠolo,
Ee, GALA, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii, ʋa ʋolu kae!
Nii makɛ, nii ɗa ɓɔɠɔi è siingai,
Leezɛn ʋɔnɔgi tɛi ge ɠalaa, é leʋea ga.
È-yeei yɛ zunui naa ʋa, nii é zeini è yeezazuʋɛ,
Gi la mɔ zeɠea è ʋa eyɛsu pɛ.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii, gi zei ʋele ɓɛtɛ ʋolu,
